title: The Futurellis
description: The show about a futuristic Italian American family where all the characters are robots.
quote: Hey, that cat owes me money.
altHero: futuristic city buildings on tall poles in the sky
alt1: futuristic pizza parlor in the sky
alt2: grumpy robot man and dog walking on a rotating pizza platform
alt3: robot dog frowning at sweating robot cat
alt4: robot man falling down on the pizza platform
